И то пока у вас не забомбит от того что пинга бешеная и сыграть вам нормально не удастся, удачи!

O jogo é muito bom, só tem alguns fatores que pecam na jogabilidade, como hit's mentirosos ou impossíveis e alguns fatores, mas todo jogo tem seus problemas, cabe a nós jogadores e desenvolvedores termos maturidade para trabalharmos em conjunto para melhorar o game de modo geral, tanto em questões de jogabilidade como em comunidade, pois, apesar de o jogo ser extremamente empolgante, intuitivo e divertido, algumas pessoas que jogam Dead By Daylight são tóxicas, que acabam com a partida pelas suas devidas atitudes e palavras infantis, mas retirando isso, o jogo é muito bom, recomendo 100%.

Llevo 800 horas a este juego y no lo recomiendo, lleno de bugs, lleno e micro transacciones, un desvalance total, lleno de toxicidad, si quieres pasar un buen momento o agradable este juego no es para ti y si te preguntas porque yo lo juego es nada mas por competetividad con amigos el dia que ellos se van yo tambien, malisimo el juego!!!!!

Dead by Daylight, a game I love and hate at the same time.

Pros:
Good character skins/artwork 
Good perks to be very versatile
Good mechanics (most of the time)
Never gets boring by yourself but better with friends
KYF = FUN

Cons:
Toxic Community
Bad hitboxes
Should be more events
Not enough new updates
Some offerings are bad

Overall this game is really nice though and I think it can be better with a few fixes, no game is perfect though and if this game was perfect the game would suck. 

A little note to add: 
When updates do come out, they sure are fun to play the new killer and new survivor and try out all the mechanics with their new abilities.

The game just got easier for the new players with the Hex: Ruin nerf.
Fun to play with friends.

Полная помойка и параша, разрабы с членом во рту пофиксить не могут ничего, додики.
Не тратьте свои деньги и нервы.

The game is balanced at around rank 10 with the killers getting progressively worse as you move up the ranks. Surivors have the greater advantage because of how easy it is to loop a killer while the other survivors are working on gens with a few exceptions such as the nurse. The developers are still trying to nerf the killers instead of encouraging newer players to get better at the game.

If you want to play with friends I'd recommend it but fuck you.
This game cured my depressed programming

Its finally here after many hours I decide to uninstall game, no more toxicity, bad matchmaking, players team up with killers, DC, unfair levels- perks, bad ranking- get points and etc. Its over.  Here are some of my examples why I did it... 
Is this game well balanced- no. Is it fun playing- sometimes. If you want casually to play this- don't bother- since there is not so may explain what to do...You need lots of time to figure things out, and many hours of YouTube if you want to learn something.

Now as long time killer payer- Basically if you are decent player and have great perks, players don't have a chance, some of killer and are not balanced at all like Buba. There is nothing  you can do if he cramped in basement, like most of Buba players do. I witness lots of toxicity, cheating, and may other things and report it, I never get replayed or has anything changed on that level.

As survivor - many useless perks, most of perks have some bad downgrade, or percentage is too low, or have to do lots of things to perk work, or you need to have incredible luck. Looping is much easier with gamepad controller. If you are solo player like me, you have slim chances to win, only if rest of players are pro- red rank and if they know what are doing if not you are doomed to fail, especially if in team someone with low rank. Many time people when see Buba or have bad start, they simply disconnected from game, if we have 5 gens, and someone DC, we should have some advantage on gens or something like that or that match is pointless. Developers never address that. 

Still after this time don't now in percentage what greatly, moderately, slightly is? And if 
 we combine all four greatly offering  like murky reagent (Mist) did all four combine, or its used only one since I presume greatly is 100% of mist so you cant go above that, and rest of tree are wasted. 

Instead making this changes that nobody wont- like, make game more playable - matchmaking is terrible, balance is bad, toxic, there are no consequences for that. Playing it more than 4 years. So this is it no more. This is advice for beginners not to start since you will do the same, and waste too many hours, and then delete it...  Best regards.

Large grind ahead to get you up to speed with all the killer and survivor perks, but overall a super fun game. Naturally in a 4v1 environment there are often a bunch of morons in the post game chat, but overall it's usually a positive experience on both sides.

I've got over 400 hours in at the point of writing this review, and I know a lot of people with thousands of hours in the game.

Какой смысл расписывать плюсы и минусы, если даже банально поиграть не всегда удаётся? Бесконечные поиски игр (в особенности за маньяка), постоянные стопоры игры при тех же поисках и загрузке игр. К примеру если я сворачиваю игру дабы как идиот не смотреть в пустой монитор при (опять же долгом) поиске, этот самый поиск в большинстве случаев зависнет и выдаст ошибку, либо зависнет сама игра, которую закрыть удаётся лишь через диспетчер. Я не шарю в подборе игр, но будто случайный из пяти игроков держит лобби, которое сразу распускается при разрыве интернет-соединения, и ладно бы это всегда был к примеру условный маньяк, однако как я заметил кидает эту "привилегию" на любого из пяти, и если дропается этот "главарь", то дропается и сама игра.. Затронем разрывы интернет соединения (секундные разрывы), которые приравниваются к ливу из игры, почему бы не сделать повторный вход, пусть персонаж кимарит в режиме афк, но это лучше чем ничего. Аудитория игры довольно большая, соотношение людей играющих за маньяка/сурвов так же держит хорошее соотношение, при том что за сурвов можно играть в пати, то это в любом случае задаёт перевес, однако мы всё равно не можем банально поиграть. (Моё мнение далеко не экспертное и разумеется в нём есть некое недопонимание и ошибки, но всё же суть я думаю вы поняли.)
